name: Java Geolocation GPS Tracking
short_description:
Java Geo location GPS tracking still in early stage,
intended to read GPS coordinates from a GPS device and visualize the location on an Java Embedded Chromium Browser,
Capabilities may not support yet due to the GoogleMaps API Restrictions which not given to JCEF (Java Chromium Embedded API) for Free.
You need to activate billing or payment option even for the free plan of the GoogleMaps API to work.

PENDING Optimizations with Excelsior JET Technologies to improve and protect project integrity of the binary release version when it's available.
visit: https://sourceforge.net/u/srgbolonna/excelsiorjet/ or visit: http://www.excelsior-usa.com/
